movie.title: Die Adern der Welt
movie.staff: by Byambasuren Davaa | with Bat-Ireedui Batmunkh, Purevdorj Uranchimeg, Algirchamin Baatarsuren, Enerel Tumen, Yalalt Namsrai
movie.description: For the Mongolian nomad boy Amra, the accidental death of his father represents a tragic end to a happy childhood. His grief proves to be a source of empowerment, fuelling Amra’s quest to honour his father’s memory and take on a powerful mining company.

movie.title: Die Adern der Welt

movie.title: A l’abordage
movie.staff: by Guillaume Brac | with Éric Nantchouang, Salif Cissé, Édouard Sulpice, Asma Messaoudene, Ana Blagojevic
movie.description: One summer night in Paris, Félix meets Alma by chance and they get along beautifully. He decides to surprise her at the place where her family is holidaying in the south and enlists his best friend in an adventure that won’t leave them quite the same.

movie.title: A l’abordage

movie.title: Alice Júnior
movie.staff: by Gil Baroni | with Anne Celestino Mota, Emmanuel Rosset, Thaís Schier, Surya Amitrano, Matheus Moura
movie.description: After moving to a conservative small town in southern Brazil, Alice, a transgender girl, has to confront her repressive new surroundings. But, full of courage, energy and self-confidence, the young YouTuber turns established stereotypes upside down.

movie.title: Alice Júnior
movie.staff: by Gil Baroni | with Anne Celestino Mota, Emmanuel Rosset, Thaís Schier, Surya Amitrano, Matheus Moura

movie.title: Always Amber
movie.staff: by Lia Hietala, Hannah Reinikainen | with Amber Mastracci, Sebastian, Olivera, Alma Mastracci, Luciano Mastracci
movie.description: Amber belongs to a queer generation which no longer wants to allow society to dictate their identity. The teenagers proudly inhabit a spectrum of fluid identities and master their first loves and losses.

movie.title: An American Romance
movie.staff: by King Vidor | with Brian Donlevy, Ann Richards, Walter Abel, John Qualen, Stephen McNally
movie.description: From mineworker to manufacturing mogul. A mixture of family chronicle and economic documentary, the film follows the ascent of a European immigrant to the US from the early 20th century through the bombing of Pearl Harbor in December 1941.

movie.title: An American Romance
movie.staff: by King Vidor | with Brian Donlevy, Ann Richards, Walter Abel, John Qualen, Stephen McNally
movie.description: From mineworker to manufacturing mogul. A mixture of family chronicle and economic documentary, the film follows the ascent of a European immigrant to the US from the early 20th century through the bombing of Pearl Harbor in December 1941.

movie.title: The American Sector
movie.staff: by Courtney Stephens, Pacho Velez
movie.description: A documentary about the concrete sections of the Berlin Wall that have been acquired by institutions or individuals since 1989 and are now scattered across the USA. Cherished or abandoned, they have become silent witnesses to recent history.

movie.title: The American Sector
movie.staff: by Courtney Stephens, Pacho Velez
movie.description: A documentary about the concrete sections of the Berlin Wall that have been acquired by institutions or individuals since 1989 and are now scattered across the USA. Cherished or abandoned, they have become silent witnesses to recent history.

movie.title: Anaparastasi
movie.staff: by Theo Angelopoulos | with Toula Stathopoulou, Yannis Totsikas, Thanos Gammenos, Petros Hoedas, Mihalis Fotopoulos
movie.description: Theo Angelopoulos’ virtuoso debut is at once the cool reconstruction of a crime of passion and a half-documentary exploration of the social conditions that form the backdrop to the murder.

movie.title: Anaparastasi
movie.staff: by Theo Angelopoulos | with Toula Stathopoulou, Yannis Totsikas, Thanos Gammenos, Petros Hoedas, Mihalis Fotopoulos
movie.description: Theo Angelopoulos’ virtuoso debut is at once the cool reconstruction of a crime of passion and a half-documentary exploration of the social conditions that form the backdrop to the murder.

movie.title: Anne at 13,000 ft
movie.staff: by Kazik Radwanski | with Deragh Campbell, Matt Johnson, Dorothea Paas, Lawrene Denkers
movie.description: Even in her job at a children’s day care centre, Anne prefers fun to actual work and often alienates those around her with her erratic behaviour. Deragh Campbell gives a brilliant performance in this study of a woman teetering on the brink.

movie.title: Anne at 13,000 ft
movie.staff: by Kazik Radwanski | with Deragh Campbell, Matt Johnson, Dorothea Paas, Lawrene Denkers

movie.title: Anunciaron tormenta
movie.staff: by Javier Fernández Vázquez | with Justo Bolekia Boleká, Reha-Xustina Bolekia Bueriberi, Nieves Posa Bohome, Paciencia Tobilleri Bepe, Ricardo Bulá Bitema
movie.description: Ësáasi Eweera, one of the last kings of the Bubi people of Equatorial Guinea and a threat to Spanish colonial rule, died in suspicious circumstances. A century later, the case is reopened: a formalist detective story and an indictment of colonialism.

movie.title: Anunciaron tormenta
movie.staff: by Javier Fernández Vázquez | with Justo Bolekia Boleká, Reha-Xustina Bolekia Bueriberi, Nieves Posa Bohome, Paciencia Tobilleri Bepe, Ricardo Bulá Bitema

movie.title: Gli appunti di Anna Azzori / Uno specchio che viaggia nel tempo
movie.title2: The Notes of Anna Azzori / A Mirror that Travels through Time
movie.staff: by Constanze Ruhm | with Gemma Vannuzzi, Mona Abdel Baky, Kheda Durtaeva, Ljubica Jaksic, Hannah Morscher
movie.description: Shot from 1972-75, Anna observed a young drug addict expecting a child. Ruhm’s essay film draws on this previous work and asks about the place of women in a world that was full of discrimination back in the 70s and remains so today.

movie.title: Gli appunti di Anna Azzori / Uno specchio che viaggia nel tempo

movie.title: Around the Block: Talents Goes Kiez
movie.staff: with Anne Lakeberg
movie.description: Welcome to the hood! The collectively run Filmrauschpalast in Berlin-Moabit invites Talents and members of the public to join in with audience development experts and locals as talk turns to strategies that make a community cinema the heart of a "Kiez."

movie.title: Art to Live in: Hang Out with ruangrupa
movie.staff: with Mirwan Andan
movie.description: Jakarta-based ruangrupa turns the HAU into a space to hang out. In an invitation to unformatted exchange, the collective behind the artistic direction of documenta fifteen allows cooperation, agreement and the right to stage collective protest take over the floor.

movie.title: The Assistant
movie.staff: by Kitty  Green | with Julia Garner, Matthew Macfadyen, Makenzie Leigh, Kristine Froseth, Jon Orsini
movie.description: Jane recently landed her dream job as assistant to a powerful media mogul. She is soon confronted with abusive practices and realises the dark underbelly of the system she has just entered. A film in the wake of the #MeToo movement.

movie.title: The Assistant
movie.staff: by Kitty  Green | with Julia Garner, Matthew Macfadyen, Makenzie Leigh, Kristine Froseth, Jon Orsini

movie.title: Audi Short Film Award Anniversary Selection
movie.staff: with Anna Henckel-Donnersmarck, Bárbara Wagner, Benjamin de Burca
movie.description: For five years, a short film in the Berlinale Shorts competition has won the Audi Short Film Award. To celebrate our anniversary, previous prize-winning films Planet ∑, Solar Walk and Rise are being screened in the Audi Berlinale Lounge.

movie.title: Aufzeichnungen aus der Unterwelt
movie.staff: by Tizza Covi , Rainer Frimmel | with Kurt Girk, Alois Schmutzer
movie.description: A love letter to Vienna of the 1960s that is also a social portrait of post-war Austria. Viennese folk singer Kurt Girk and his friend Alois Schmutzer discuss their lives in Vienna’s underworld milieu – for which they served long prison terms.

movie.title: Aufzeichnungen aus der Unterwelt
